AltName.entry: VENTURE INTO BUSINESS AND EDUCATION LTD

Desc.entry: A specialist organisation creating links between business and education for the mutual benefit of both communities. Is a not-for-profit company with strong well established roots in each of the local areas of South Yorkshire: Barnsley, Doncaster, Rotherham and Sheffield. Partners include the local authorities, chambers of commerce, careers organisations, universities and all local schools and colleges. Has active partnerships with many of the Sector Skills bodies and are involved at the centre of development for the 14-19 vocational Diplomas and Young Apprenticeship schemes.

Pubs.entry: Introduction To Work Experience, I-Choose Career Pathway documents

ContactName.entry: Beryl Henshaw, Operations Manager/Peter Davies, IT & Resource Manager

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Visit the website for more details of events
